name: wnr
description: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. The name is an abbr of "Work and Rest".

scripts.electron: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && cd cdv && cordova build electron --release && cd ../
scripts.electron-debug: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && cd cdv && cordova run electron --debug && cd ../
scripts.cordova: vue-cli-service build --mode cordova && cd cdv && cordova build android && cd ../
scripts.web: vue-cli-service build --mode web && cd cdv && cordova run browser && cd ../

author: RoderickQiu
